direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle socket options, with getOption retrieving and setOption setting them.

Both methods manage options, with setPTCPOption setting PseudoTCP-specific options.
Both methods access and return configuration settings related to the socket.
Both methods modify or retrieve settings related to the socket's configuration.
